about.title: About
text: Hello, I'm Gabriela! I'm passionate about combining technology and creativity to craft purposeful digital experiences. With a background in psychology, I'm driven by curiosity and the desire to connect with people through design and interaction.
I'm optimistic, flexible, and enjoy working with teams to create projects that balance aesthetics, functionality, and usability.
Developed a mobile application featuring a video game using Unity and C#.
Designed UX/UI and created assets and interfaces.
Debugged and tested the game, identified and fixed bugs, adjusted mechanics, and optimized for a smooth user experience.
Corporate website for a pair of pianists, designed to showcase their musical career.

Developed using Vite, React, TypeScript, and CSS, integrating a content management system based on Strapi and a Node.js API. The project was managed following Agile methodology and versioned with Git.
Financial management application developed with React and React Router.
Features: User login, budget creation, data submission, expense management form, tables and expenses page, budget visualization in cards, links to budgets, user deletion, and toast notifications.
Retro game developed using CSS, HTML, and JavaScript.
Features: Multiple levels, lives system, scoring system, pause functionality, Game Over and victory screens, sound effects, and custom visual design.
Task management and timing application, developed using JavaScript, CSS, and HTML.

Features: Create tasks with assigned time, calculate total time worked and remaining time for tasks, pause option, delete tasks, mark tasks as completed, automatic status change when a task is finished, and custom visual design.
